content.rendered:
Laura and Massimo’s relationship is at stake as they try to overcome trust issues and jealousy, while persistent Nacho works to tear them apart.

Directors: Barbara Bialowas. Tomasz Mandes

Written By Tomasz Klimala. Tomasz Mandes. Barbara Bialowas

Stars: Anna-Maria Sieklucka. Michele Morrone. Bronislaw Wroclawski
